Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di

Provides the classes necessary for performing dependency injection.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActivityInjector
    Responsible for injecting an Activity with Android resources and framework components.
    BeanDefinitionBuilder
    Provides a means to construct AbstractBeanDefinition instances.
    BeanFactory
    Stores beans that have been configured in infinitum.cfg.xml or through annotations.
    BeanFactoryPostProcessor
    This interface enables an InfinitumContext to have its BeanFactory modified after it has been configured.
    BeanPostProcessor
    Allows for beans to be modified after they are initialized by the container.
    BeanProvider
    Provides a hook for implementing classes to provide bean definitions which will be registered with the BeanFactory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBeanDefinition
    Describes a bean instance, including its name, type, property values, and constructor arguments.
    AbstractProxy
    Provides proxy support for the AOP framework.
    DexMakerProxy
    Abstract implementation of AbstractProxy that relies on DexMaker in order to proxy non-final classes in addition to interfaces.
    JdkDynamicProxy
    Abstract implementation of AbstractProxy that relies on the JDK-provided Proxy in order to proxy interfaces.
    XmlBean
    Encapsulates the notion of a "bean", which consists of a name or ID, a class, and optional properties, as defined in XML.
    XmlBean.Property
    Encapsulates a bean property, which represents a Field inside a bean instance.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractProxy.ProxyType
    Indicates the backing implementation of a proxy.
    ActivityInjector.Event
    Defines the type of input event that occurs on a View.

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di Description

Provides the classes necessary for performing dependency injection.
